Adidas is back with their latest Yeezy Boost 350 V2. Fresh off the heels of NBA All-Star Weekend, these Yeezy's are nicknamed the "Zebras," and come in a classic white, black and red color scheme. Sporting a white-based Primeknit upper with black accents giving off a Zebra stripe vibe, �SPLY-350� displayed across the sides in red finished off by a translucent BOOST cushioned sole. To date they are the most limited adidas Yeezy release and have instantly become one of the most popular colorways. Their release date is set for February 25th, 2017. Retail is set at $220 and they will only be available in men�s sizing, no love for infants from Yeezus this time around.
